model.interfaces

Interface IDailyTime

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DailyTime

    public interface IDailyTime
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface that defines the daily academic timetable and the operations applicable to it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FIRST_HOUR
      Int constant that represents the starting time of academic courses.
      static int HOURS
      Int constant that represents the number of hours in a specified academic day.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(ISubject sub, int hour, int n)
      Aggiunge una materia nell'arco di tempo indicato.
      IDailyTime copy()
      It creates a copy of itself, in order to respect the method #equals(Object).
      java.util.Optional<ISubject> getSubject(int hour)
      It gives back the course in a specified hour.
      void remove(int hour, int n)
      It removes all courses in the specified time frame, in case of lack of courses it doesn't throw any exception.

    • Field Detail

      • HOURS

        static final int HOURS
        Int constant that represents the number of hours in a specified academic day.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FIRST_HOUR

        static final int FIRST_HOUR
        Int constant that represents the starting time of academic courses.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(ISubject sub,
         int hour,
         int n)
        Aggiunge una materia nell'arco di tempo indicato. It adds a subject in the specified time frame.
        Parameters:
        sub - Subject to be inserted on.
        hour - Lesson starting time.
        n - Number of consecutive hours in which the subject passed as parameter starting from hour is taught.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a certain number of hours or all specified hours are already occupied by other courses or if hour and n have contradictory values. hour must be bigger or the same of FIRST_HOUR and less than FIRST_HOUR + HOURS, n must be bigger than 0 and the sum hour + n must be between FIRST_HOUR and FIRST_HOUR + HOURS.

      • remove

        void remove(int hour,
            int n)
        It removes all courses in the specified time frame, in case of lack of courses it doesn't throw any exception.
        Parameters:
        hour - Hour from which starting to remove subjects.
        n - Number of consecutive hours in which removing subjects starting from hour.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if hour and n have contradictory values. hour must be bigger or the same of FIRST_HOUR and less than FIRST_HOUR + HOURS, n must be bigger than 0 and the sum hour + n must be between FIRST_HOUR and FIRST_HOUR + HOURS.

      • getSubject

        java.util.Optional<ISubject> getSubject(int hour)
        It gives back the course in a specified hour.
        Parameters:
        hour - Hour in which looking for the subject to be given back.
        Returns:
        The course given in the specified hour. It is used an Optional in order to avoid giving back null Optional in case that there is no course in the specified hour.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if hour and n have contradictory values. hour must be bigger or the same of FIRST_HOUR and less than FIRST_HOUR + HOURS.

      • copy

        IDailyTime copy()
        It creates a copy of itself, in order to respect the method #equals(Object).
        Returns:
        A copy of the object that call this method.
